constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 97 (Friday, June 4, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SABLAN:
H.R. 3729.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Under Article 1, Section 8 of the Constitution.
[Page H2693]

latestAction.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

sponsors.fullName: Del. Sablan, Gregorio Kilili Camacho [D-MP-At Large]

title: Northern Mariana Islands and American Samoa College Access Act
